Dialogues.Text: Oh my... What a pure essence you've consumed... Undoubtably an essence from the Slime God. Let us see what power it grants...
This essence grants you the power to unleash the Ambrosia that's gathered within you in the form of a powerful attack: a barrage of slimy globs.
Additionally, the muck formed by the rotting corpses of the Gods shall gather around you. Forcing it to converge shall transform it into Ambrosia that you may make use of.
Truly a potent boon to have at your disposal. Wield it well as you continue our conquest!
